metadata.title: CVE-2024-27285 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: YARD is a Ruby Documentation tool. The "frames.html" file within the YardDoc's generated documentation is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)attacks due to inadequate sanitization of user input within the JavaScriptsegment of the "frames.erb" template file. This vulnerability is fixed in0.9.36.

criterions.comment: yard package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
